snippet: Tom Allon, a newspaper publisher and a longtime Democrat, said he would switch parties to increase his odds of making it to the general election ballot.
abstract: Tom Allon, a newspaper publisher  and longtime Democrat waging a long-shot bid as a candidate for mayor of New York City, announces that he is switching to the Republican Party to increase his odds of making it to the 2013 general election ballot.
lead_paragraph: Tom Allon, a newspaper publisher and a longtime Democrat, said he would switch parties to increase his odds of making it to the general election ballot.

headline.seo: Tom Allon, in Mayoral Bid, Switches to Republican Party
headline.print_headline: A Mayoral Hopeful Switches to the G.O.P.
